metadata.title: Tuesday, 16th November, 2021
metadata.session: FIRST SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that there is an outbreak of Contagious Bovine Pleural Pneumonia (CBPP) disease in Chief Kabwika and Senior Chief Kanongeshaâ€™s chiefdoms in Mwinilunga District; and

(a) why the Government is using military vehicles to transport farming inputs under the Farmer Input Support Programme; and

(b) whether the use of the military vehicles does not compromise state security. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Supply - Motion (29th October) - Resumption of Debate: (Mr Katotobwe, MP) __________________________
